comment._content: Putting a backlighting to soften the shadows from background.

comment.author: 10004931@N07
comment._content:
Your pictures have explained that what all people have gone through in the days of WAR. All pictures are heart touching and gives us an IDEA that how people have struggled to live in those days. Now those days of struggle is gone. 
People in those days were still helpful to each other and they were loyal. Now when good days have come where there is no bondage then we have becomes each others enemy and making this world more crucial to live then in the days of world war. I hope that we get a lesson from this and work to make this world a better place.
